DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
A 0 cost 8 damage card that costs 3 Honkai to play.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Common attacks deal 2 extra damage. Common skills gain 2 extra block.
Deal extra damage equal to your Honkai. Take extra damage equal to your Honkai.
The card costs 0 energy when you have enough Honkai.
Whenever the target gets attacked, deal additional damage.
